official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to require the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to continue to admit and treat, without charge, persons at facilities of the Public Health Service for purposes of study.
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to continue to admit and treat, without charge, persons at facilities of the Public Health Service for purposes of study.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to require the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to continue to admit and treat, without charge, persons at facilities of the Public Health Service for purposes of study.
